longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for at least 3 months beyond the period of intended stay.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for nationals
of Qatar.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of a visa issued by Ireland (Rep.), USA, United Kingdom or a
Schengen Member State or not longer than the
expiry of the visa, if the validity of the visa is less than
30 days.
Minors:
- Children up to and including 14 years of age
  
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold proof of sufficient funds to
  cover their stay and documents required for their next
  destination.
- Holders of tourist visas must also hold hotel vouchers. 
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward ticket could be refused
  entry
